S.FORM: Eric Bledsoe nalecuhan i Birmingham, Alabama, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Eric Bledsoe i 2010 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 18, namapili' tu nu Oklahoma City Thunder putiput. 12 bulad 9 demiad, 1989 a mihca, Eric Bledsoe, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
